mapper.insert: INSERT INTO group_account SET group_account_id=#{groupAccountId}, group_admin_id = #{groupAdminId}, group_account_name = #{groupAccountName}, profile_pic=#{profilePic}, moments_pics=#{momentsPics}, relationship=#{relationship}, privacy_mode= #{privacyMode}, answer=#{answer}, created_time=now();
INSERT INTO group_member SET group_account_id=#{groupAccountId}, user_id = #{userId}, member_status=#{memberStatus};
mapper.update: UPDATE group_account SET follower_count = follower_count + 1 WHERE group_account_id=#{value}
UPDATE group_account SET follower_count = follower_count - 1 WHERE group_account_id=#{value}
UPDATE group_account SET post_count = post_count + 1 WHERE group_account_id=#{value}
UPDATE group_account SET post_count = post_count - 1 WHERE group_account_id=#{value}
mapper.select: SELECT group_account_id, group_admin_id, group_account_name, moments_pics, follower_count, post_count, profile_pic, relationship, answer, privacy_mode, created_time FROM group_account;

SELECT group_account_id, group_admin_id, group_account_name, moments_pics, follower_count, post_count, profile_pic, relationship, answer, privacy_mode, created_time FROM group_account WHERE group_account_id=#{value};

SELECT group_account_id, group_admin_id, group_account_name, moments_pics, follower_count, post_count, profile_pic, relationship, answer, privacy_mode, created_time, EXISTS(SELECT * FROM follower where account_id=#{groupAccountId} AND user_id=#{userId}) AS user_following FROM group_account WHERE group_account_id=#{groupAccountId};

SELECT group_account.group_account_id , group_account.group_admin_id, group_account.group_account_name, group_account.profile_pic, group_account.privacy_mode FROM group_account INNER JOIN group_member ON group_account.group_account_id=group_member.group_account_id AND group_member.user_id=#{value} AND group_member.member_status=2;
SELECT group_account_id, user_id, notification_mode, member_status FROM group_member WHERE group_account_id=#{value} AND member_status=2;

SELECT group_account_id, group_admin_id, group_account_name, moments_pics, follower_count, post_count, profile_pic, relationship, answer, privacy_mode, created_time FROM group_account WHERE group_account_name LIKE #{value};
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM group_member WHERE group_account_id=#{groupAccountId} AND user_id=#{userId};
DELETE FROM group_member WHERE group_account_id=#{groupAccountId} AND user_id=#{userId};
